item.title: Logging Inkbird IBS-TH1 values with Raspberry Pi
item.description: #Introduction This article is the same as Omron Environmental Sensor (BAG type) article This article was conducted with the low-priced Inkbird IBS-TH1. The battery used for the mini used last time was bad, so I aimed to improve the endurance with this product using AAA batteries. What is #Inkbird? It is a manufacturer in Shenzhen, China that makes various home IoT sensors. It is attractive that it has a complete set of functions such as data acquisition with smartphone apps and APIs at a low price (about 3000 yen).
